Black T-Shirt

So the other day I was reading 12 Common Photoshop Mistakes and Malpractice and one of the items was talking about "Assuming K=100 is Black". This had me thinking on how many different ways you can have the color black. I thought to myself, this would be a cool t-shirt. I came up with design and now just have to figure where to have it printed.

August 19th , 2010 ∴ Kennedy

 Birds of a feather flock together. Follow me on Twitter at @KennedysGarage.
